event.title: leaves a hotel with his arm in a sling in Palencia, Spain, Monday March 23, 2009

data.event: Lance Armstrong of the U.S. leaves a hotel with his arm in a sling in Palencia, Spain, Monday March 23, 2009.
Armstrong fractured his collarbone Monday in a crash during the Vuelta of Castilla and Leon race, disrupting the seven-time Tour de France champion's comeback.

event.title: question his participation in the Tour de France in July

data.event: Armstrong said he would fly to the United States and meet with medical experts to decide whether he needs surgery, leaving in question his participation in the Tour de France in July.
